name: Schoolmates: The Mystery of the Magical Bracelet
name_original: Schoolmates: The Mystery of the Magical Bracelet
description: Long ago, a dark order of mages decided to wreak havoc upon the land but was kept at bay by another group known as the Selena order. Help the three young apprentices, Flex,  Eva and Blondie to defeat a powerful mage in this incredible hidden object and point & click adventure! "Schoolmates - The Mystery of the Magical Bracelet" is a fun challenge for all ages.
